name: cryptocoin-folio
description: A website for a simplified crypto-coin ticker and dashboard portal which shows near-real-time value movement of the 10 coins by fetching the data from websites like coinmarketcap.com, poloniex.com. It shows the visualization of data for 3 periods (1 day, 1 week, 1 month) and derive metrics from the collected data (simple moving average, candle stick representation).
